recipes.description: Ingredients: 1 cup dried chickpeas | 1/2 cup onion, chopped | 1 cup parsley | 1 small green chile pepper, serrano or jalapeno pepper | 3 garlic cloves | 1 tsp cumin | 1 tsp salt | 1/2 tsp cardamom | 1/4 tsp black pepper | 2 tbsp chickpea flour | 1/2 tsp baking soda | avocado oil for frying

recipes.description: Ingredients: 1/4 cup (60ml) Extra virgin olive oil |1 Onion, finely chopped | 4 Garlic cloves, thinly sliced | 3/4 cup (210g) Tomato paste | 1/2 cup (125ml) Vodka | 1/4 cup (60ml) Thickened cream |1/2 cup (40g) Finely grated parmesan | 400g Rigatoni, cooked to packet instructions | 1/4 cup (60ml) Cooking water reserved
recipes.name: Tomato Vodka Rigatoni
